entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
